informationAboutHydraDx.title: multi-asset liquidity omnipool
informationAboutHydraDx.text: Our unique solution enables combining all assets into one shared liquidity pool – unlocking unparalleled efficiency.

informationAboutHydraDx.title: powered by hdx
informationAboutHydraDx.text: Native reserve token improves security and aligns incentives of key network participants. The total supply of HDX is a function of liquidity provisioned.

advantages: Users don’t have to use asset in pairs, rather one or any number of assets
Users can put their idle capital to work
Financial infrastructure for developers and their applications (e.g. swap assets directly in wallet, you can plug it to dex aggregators or liquidity aggregator yearn finance)
Liquidity providing - instead of just holding your assets on a wallet, you can provide asset to liquidity pool to earn fees and HDX
